long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Followers Pro for Instagram is more than a regular auto follow extension. It also unfollows accounts you followed before, so your following number stays reasonable.

Get more Instagram followers automatically. 
Grow your account, expand your reach, build your brand and get more leads â€” organically.

ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» Features
âœ“ Follow/Unfollow Process in the background
âœ“ You can follow the user's followers and following automatically
âœ“ You can follow the users who have commented or liked on a post automatically
âœ“ You have the option to not follow private users
âœ“ You have options to Unfollow users:
    âœ“ Users who don't follow you back(followed by this tool). It remembers the mass followed users. So you can later mass unfollow those only.
    âœ“ Users who don't follow you  back
    âœ“ Users who you are following

ğŸ“Œ Strategies to Prevent Being Limited
- For every 6 users followed/unfollowed, take a 10 minutes cooldown period
- You can customize the number of people and the number of minutes for cooldown in the settings.

ğŸ©¹ Intelligent error handling
- If a request error occurs, pause for 30 minutes before retrying
- You can customize the number of minutes for pause in the settings

ğŸŸ¢ represents the user-defined time interval being used
ğŸŸ  represents the cooldown time interval plus the user-defined time interval being used
ğŸ”´ represents the pause time interval being used

ğŸ“ƒ How to Start Following the Userâ€™s Followers and Following?
- Enter the Instagram username or open the extension on the Instagram userâ€™s profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username
- Select which List to Follow: Followers or Following
- Click the Start Following Button

ğŸ“ƒ How to Start Following the Users Who Have Commented or Liked the Post?
- Paste the link of the post or open the post first and then launch the extension, the extension will automatically fill in the link of the post
- Select which List to Follow: Comments or Likes
- Click the Start Following Button

ğŸ“ƒ How to Start Unfollowing?
- Switch to the third tab
- Choose the type of unfollowing
- Click the Start Unfollowing button

âš ï¸ Attention
The tool automatically follows or unfollows 144 users per day (6 users per hour). Unfortunately, Instagram has limits, and these limits vary from account to account. For this reason, we limit the processing time and the number of follows and unfollows. We recommend using the extension sparingly to ensure its continuous functionality.

ğŸ“¬ Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

â„¹ï¸ Statement
INSTAGRAM is a trademark of Instagram, LLC. Followers Pro is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to INSTAGRAM, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
